mention.text: Antarctica , a coalition of environmental groups

an international conference on the future of the frozen continent Gore spoke at a news conference sponsored by the Alliance for Antarctica , a coalition of environmental groups a news conference sponsored by the Alliance for Antarctica
, chairman of the House Interior subcommittee on parks and public land
